alert.note: Alert for Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 25 at 2:15PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Gusty Winds and Low Relative Humidity Sunday... .Although the relative humidity is forecasted to be slightly above criteria, wind gusts of 40-55 MPH and dry vegetation across the region cause concern for rapid fire growth. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 002... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds, which is in effect Sunday afternoon. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins. * Timing...Sunday Afternoon * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 18 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 60s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
